qas.question: In what year did Paris get a police force?
What was the largest European city in 1667?
What was the title of the head of Paris's police, in English?
What was the title of the head of Paris's police, in French?
In what year did Paris not get a police force?
Who never created Paris's police force?
What was the smallest European city in 1667?
What was the largest European city in 1676?
What was the title of the bottom of Paris's police, in English?

context: The first centrally organised police force was created by the government of <a1_0><b6_0>King Louis XIV<b6_0/><a1_0/> in <a0_0><b5_0>1667<b5_0/><a0_0/> to police the city of <a2_0><b7_0><b8_0>Paris<b8_0/><b7_0/><a2_0/>, then the largest city in Europe. The royal edict, registered by the Parlement of Paris on March 15, 1667 created the office of <a4_0>lieutenant général de police<a4_0/> ("<a3_0><b9_0>lieutenant general of police<b9_0/><a3_0/>"), who was to be the head of the new Paris police force, and defined the task of the police as "ensuring the peace and quiet of the public and of private individuals, purging the city of what may cause disturbances, procuring abundance, and having each and everyone live according to their station and their duties".
